charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1101_0100_:
While in town, [Name:PlayerNickname ] heard
a rumor that a rough-looking guy was challenging
anyone who passed by him to a battle.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1101_0200_:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] decided to go have a look for [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ],
thinking [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] might be able to help resolve
some of the trouble.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_0400_:
What is it, Golisopod? Already found a new
opponent to battle?
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_0600_:
Me and Golisopod are real fired up about the
PML. Yeah.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_0401_0800_:
What gives? Something like that surprised you?
Guess it ain’t too surprising. My Golisopod’s got a
real fighting spirit. No wonder you’d be surprised.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_0402_1000_:
Huh? Surprise attack? If you lower your guard,
you only got yourself to blame when you lose.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_1100_: Battle begins the moment you meet.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_1200_: In a Pokémon battle, it’s destroy or be destroyed.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_1300_:
You need to have a strategy in battle. Beating
down an opponent after a surprise attack is my
secret strat!
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_1400_:
You can say and do all the pretty, little things you
want, but it don’t mean nothing if you can’t win!
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_1500_:
I can’t stand people who fuss over how they win.
There ain’t nothing good about losing.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_1600_:
But there’s something you gotta do in battle
before you even think about winning and losing.
Know what it is, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_0401_1800_: Don’t play dumb. You give your all in battle, right?
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_0402_2000_:
You get it. Yeah. You’ve got to go all out
in each and every Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_2100_:
It doesn’t matter who your opponent is or what
kind of title they’ve got. Ain’t no need to ever
hold back or hesitate.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_2200_:
Battling means going all out! I can tell that you
don’t hold back—you destroy your opponents!
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_0401_2400_:
Heh, it’s not really something to thank me over.
Just something your boy Guzma noticed.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_0302_2500_: I don’t know if that’s true.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_0402_2600_:
What’re you acting all modest for? Big bad Guzma
is telling you it’s true, so it is. Be proud!
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_2700_:
You got some real talent, kid. You should really
think about joining up with Team Skull someday.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_2800_:
More than anyone else in the PML, I want to
destroy you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_2900_: I’m not gonna lose. Not to you or anyone else.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_3000_:
I don’t care about the fame or the prizes, but the
chance to destroy all those Trainers is too sweet to
miss out on.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_3100_: Heh... I’m looking forward to it.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_3200_: So, how about a battle right here and now?
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_3300_: Heh, I’m just messin’ with you.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_3400_:
We should keep the hype for our battle building as
long as we can.
charaepi_ch0125_00_guzma/2301_1201_3500_:
You get what I’m sayin’? Prepare yourself. Yeah.
Because I’m gonna destroy you in the PML!
